title: Season 2 Begins! - Game Showdown
description:
Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.

New season. New Team Names. Same shenanigans. Let's see who can obtain the first star and figure out real or parody video game headlines.

Season 2 Ep .1

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Housekeeping & First Question
00:03:44 - Round Robbin’
00:24:13 - Mad Categoriez
